name: TruFlight Academy
about: TruFlight Academy, located in Tulsa, Oklahoma, and also at Gundy's Airport (O38) in Owasso, is a premier helicopter flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive training to industry professionals and aspiring pilots. As a family-run institution, TruFlight aims to fill the gap in helicopter training options in the region. The academy is committed to delivering high-quality instruction using advanced aircraft, including the Cabri G2. With a focus on safety, professionalism, and hands-on experience, TruFlight Academy prepares students for successful careers in aviation. Our experienced instructors and well-maintained fleet ensure that every student receives the best possible training environment. Join TruFlight Academy to embark on a rewarding journey in helicopter aviation.
